name: From 0 To 100
description:
You're a very shy kid and never know what to say. However, with the help of a newly acquired book, you try to become the most popular guy in school. Cultivate your people skills and grow into a more social person.

Answer the people at school as best as you can to gain popularity, but don't take too long to answer! Can you go from 0 to 100?

This game was made for the Quad Jam Spring 2019.
